id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t0.0
text: Researchers are preparing us for a revolution that will change the world forever by looking

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t8.52
text: into the future of artificial intelligence.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t11.700000000000001
text: This revolution isn't going to happen in a few decades, but in a few years, which means

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t16.52
text: that the clock is ticking for now for businesses to start embracing AI.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t22.04
text: Artificial intelligence has become a part of our lives.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t25.2
text: Due to its revolutionary nature, artificial intelligence also faces numerous debates regarding

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t30.56
text: potential impacts on individuals.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t33.2
text: Although it could be risky, it's also a fantastic opportunity.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t37.04
text: It is estimated that the global artificial intelligence market will reach $267 billion

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t44.4
files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t46.16
text: People are worrying about losing their jobs as AI continues to advance, because it has

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t50.78
text: revolutionized industries across all sectors.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t54.12
text: But AI has increased the number of jobs and possibilities available to individuals across

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t59.4
text: all industries.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t60.8
text: Every machine needs a person to run it.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t63.16
text: Although AI has replaced certain occupations, it still creates more jobs for humans.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t69.2
text: AI can be categorized into three types.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t72.08
text: Firstly, weak AI performs specific tasks, like Apple's Siri.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t78.28
text: General AI performs tasks like a human.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t81.96
text: Super AI is more capable than a human, but both general AI and super AI are hypothetical

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t88.72
text: because these technologies are not yet developed and research is going on.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t93.03999999999999
text: However, the development of such AI will take a lot of time.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t97.11999999999999
text: The development of AGI will accelerate within the following 10 years.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t101.75999999999999
text: In fact, according to researchers, there is a 25% probability that by 2023, AI will

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t109.08
text: resemble humans when it comes to thinking capacity.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t112.36
text: Additionally, the current data boom, computer developments, and improvements in automated

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t117.67999999999999
text: methods and machine algorithms will provide a solid foundation for platforms with human-level

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t123.16
text: AI.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t124.16
text: AI has occupied crucial sectors like healthcare, cybersecurity, e-commerce, agriculture, robotics,

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t133.4
text: education, the military system, finance, gaming, and many more.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t139.24
text: AI is used in healthcare to identify diseases, helping healthcare service providers and their

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t144.68
text: patients make better treatment and lifestyle decisions.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t148.64000000000001
text: We can say that without AI, we couldn't have made the incredible recent advancements in

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t153.4
text: fields like robotics, virtual reality, chatbots, face recognition, and autonomous vehicles.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t162.4
text: But robot advisors in finance, insurance, legal, media, and journalism will deliver

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t168.6
text: instantaneous research or discoveries.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t171.32
text: In the upcoming years, it is anticipated that artificial intelligence and machine learning

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t176.16
text: will become more prominent in the consumer market, which will immediately affect how

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t180.6
text: well web development functions.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t183.04000000000002
text: Virtual assistants or chatbots will provide professional advice.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t187.4
text: Other advantages include strengthening governance through better decision-making processes, shortening

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t192.2
text: time to market for R&D initiatives, and streamlining transportation and supply chain networks.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t198.83999999999997
text: Given all these scenarios, AI is all set to revolutionize every sector in the near future.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t205.35999999999999
text: Given that it is expected to impact 60% of firms, artificial intelligence will continue

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t210.88
text: to spread deeper into a wide range of industries in the upcoming years.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t215.12
text: It is currently driving development in our smart devices, cars, and favorite apps.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t220.28
text: In the coming years, AI will invade every aspect of our life and eventually surpass human

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t226.2
text: intellectual capacity.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t228.12
text: It won't be long before artificial intelligence becomes a common part of our everyday lives.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t233.56
text: As it becomes more prevalent, it will allow us to live more efficiently and improve our

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t238.0
text: lives.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t239.28
text: By increasing their effectiveness, efficiency, and concentration on the primary tasks that

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t243.68
text: require people's attention, AI technologies are transforming many industry sectors.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t249.72
text: artificial intelligence will change the world for the better.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t252.52
text: Thank you for watching.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t253.52
text: Please make sure you subscribe to our channel and press the bell icon to never miss updates

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t258.56
text: from SimplyLearn.

id: files\Future of AI  Future of Artificial Intelligence 2023  AI Technology for Beginners  Simplilearn-t259.92
text: Happy learning!
